nodes.text: During the High Republic Era, a local group was active on Hosnian Prime. Wanting Senator Ghirra Starros to agitate for stronger trade controls in the Galactic Senate, the group kidnapped her daughter Avon when the girl snuck out of the Starros clan private compound while chasing a flutterbug. Avon's uncles tracked down and killed the kidnappers, but the incident caused Ghirra to become overprotective of her daughter, making Avon accompany her wherever she went for some time afterwards.
